intension: Create a Thanksgiving specials menu flyer for Hestia's Home Restaurant showcasing healthy vegetable dishes with pumpkin. The flyer advertises the restaurant's website, www.hostiashome.com.
globalcaption: The image features a table with a variety of food items displayed on it. There are several pumpkins, with one placed in the center of the table and another towards the right side. A bowl can be seen on the left side of the table, and a spoon is resting on the right side. The table is set for a special Thanksgiving meal, with the food items arranged in an appetizing manner.
keywords: autumn, celebration, dinner, fall, festive, food, greeting, holiday, meal, pumpkin, seasonal, table, thanksgiving, tradition, traditional, turkey, vegetables, thanksgiving day, thankful, post, instagram, ig, insta

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a dining table with a variety of food items displayed on it. There is a bowl placed on the table, accompanied by a spoon nearby. A pumpkin is also present on the table, adding a touch of seasonal charm. \n\nIn addition to the main items, there are several carrots scattered around the table, with some closer to the center and others near the edges. The table setting creates an inviting atmosphere for a meal or gathering
